ARABIC: قُلْنَا لَا تَخَفْ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We said, 'Have no fear. You will have the upper hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We said to him: "Fear not. You will certainly be victorious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We said to him: "Have no fear; for it is you who will prevail.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We told him, "Do not be afraid for you will be the winner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We said, “Do not fear – it is you who is dominant.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: We (Allah) said: "Fear not! Surely, you will have the upper hand."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: We said: Fear not, surely you shall be the uppermost,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We said unto him, 'Fear not; surely thou art the uppermost.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: We said: Fear not! Lo! thou art the higher.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: but We said, "Do not be afraid. It is you who shall prevail."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: We said: fear not! verily thou! thou shalt be the superior.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We said, ‘Do not be afraid. Indeed, you will have the upper hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We said: "Fear not! for thou hast indeed the upper hand:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: We (Allah) said: "Fear not! Surely, you will have the upper hand.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But We said to him: 'Do not be afraid; you shall surely be the uppermost.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We said, “Do not be afraid, you are the uppermost.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Allah said, "Fear not. Indeed, it is you who are superior.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:68] We said, to him, ‘Do not be afraid! Indeed you shall have the upper hand, over them by triumphing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (We said) to Moses: (Fear not! Lo! thou art the higher) you will be victorious over them.
